Description.Name: Contract for Bombard Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your heavy pockets, Solaris Arms, the premier mech manufacturer on the gameworld Solaris VII, has offered you a contract with one of their mechwarriors. Purchasing this contract will permit a one-time airdrop of an arena-ready Bombard BMB-013 when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. After use, the contract is void and the Bombard can no longer be called in. THIS IS A ONE-USE CONTRACT, IT WILL BECOME UNAVAILABLE AFTER USE! Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
